text: José Iván Agusto Briones (8 May 1961 - 23 May 2021) was an Ecuadorian civil engineer and politician. He was born in Guayaquil, Ecuador. Briones was the Minister of Energy from 2019 to 2020 and Minister of Planning and Development in 2018 both during the Lenin Moreno administration. For a short time in December 2018, Briones was acting Vice President of Ecuador. Briones was arrested in April 2021 as part of a corruption investigation about business dealings with Petroecuador. He was detained at a prison in Quito while awaiting his trial. Briones committed suicide by hanging at his prison cell in Quito on 23 May 2021, aged 60. ==References== Category:1961 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Ecuadorian engineers Category:Vice presidents of Ecuador Category:Politicians from Guayaquil Category:Politicians from Quito Category:Suicides by hanging Category:Politicians who committed suicide Category:People who committed suicide in prison custody
title: José Agusto Briones
